name: R.A.W. Ball
description:
WASD controls

SPACE to speed up

Score 9 to win, or have higher score at end of the time.

Theme Interpretation:

My interpretation of the game jam's theme "raw" was a Martian robotic workforce, the "Remote Access Workforce".    

Colonizing Mars would require heavy usage of a remotely accessible workforce of robots.  In this game however, they are being used for recreational purposes when there is downtime (the settler's gotta  have some fun and excitement).

IPFS/Filecoin Challenge - Game is deployed using 4EVERLAND on the IPFS!

Link below to view the DAPP version:

https://raw-ball.4everland.app/

COIL Web Monetization Challenge - If you're a subscriber on COIL and have the browser extension active, above the game   you will see a message  that it activated additional content. It adds particle effects to the game! (Shown in the screenshots)

MPL Challenge  -  I have made the game align with the Martian Premier League!

Additional :   This game is just a prototype for various multiplayer crypto games  I want to one day create.  Games where you could buy NFTs that give you  cool fancy ways to show off, cool attack moves/special abilities, funny  meme effects, and also would allow you to fight against people who support other blockchains. Like imagine if you could be an Ethereum fan, but battle against the XRP army, and see which side has more skills (all for fun of course)!  

This was my first game jam ever to actually submit something, and also my first game  to ever complete!  What a great way to get projects going!    I  won't stop  until I  can create the kinds of games/experiences that  the crypto community will love!!!

Bug Warning:

After the first game, the game doesn't keep score correctly, and the bg music doesn't stop playing! Sorry!
